synopsis.text: Based on the information provided, it seems this anime consists of a series of 2-minute chibi specials that aired alongside the main Barakamon anime series. These brief specials feature chibi versions of characters from Barakamon, primarily focusing on Naru and Seishuu. In a more comedic, lighthearted format, the specials depict the characters commenting on various topics related to their daily island lives - like Naru's insect hobbies or the struggle of having oversized chibi heads. Serving as additional content for Barakamon fans, these specials premiered exclusively on YouTube in Japan, with the first special (labeled Mijikamon Episode 0) airing prior to the main anime series as a teaser introduction. Overall, while continuing the spirit of Barakamon through its iconic characters, the specials offer brief, humorous slice-of-life tangents to complement the main island adventures.
